org.opendaylight.controller.usermanager

Interface IUserManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserManager

    public interface IUserManager
extends org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
    The Interface which describes the methods exposed by User Manager.

      • getUserLevel

        UserLevel getUserLevel(java.lang.String userName)
        Returns the highest user level for the passed user name. It checks the roles assigned to this user and checks against the well known Controller user roles to determines the highest user level associated with the user
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        Returns:
        UserLevel the highest user level for this user

      • getUserLevels

        java.util.List<UserLevel> getUserLevels(java.lang.String userName)
        Returns the list of user level for the passed user name. It checks the roles assigned to this user and checks against the well known Controller user roles to determines the corresponding list of user level associated with the user
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        Returns:
        the list of user level for this user

      • getSecurityContextRepo

        org.springframework.security.web.context.SecurityContextRepository getSecurityContextRepo()
        Returns the Security Context

      • getSessionManager

        ISessionManager getSessionManager()
        Returns the Session Manager Interface Handler
        Returns:
        ISessionManager session manager interface handler

      • isRoleInUse

        boolean isRoleInUse(java.lang.String role)
        Checks if the specified role belongs to any application. Usually an application will call this function when configuring a role, to check if that role is already being used by another application.
        Parameters:
        role - The role to check
        Returns:
        true if the specified role belongs to any application or if the role is a well-known controller role, false otherwise.
